      • isAnonymous

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean isAnonymous()
        Returns:
        True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden

      • setAnonymous

        public void setAnonymous​(@NonNull
                         java.lang.Boolean anonymous)
        Parameters:
        anonymous - True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden

      • getCanManageChat

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanManageChat()
        Returns:
        True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, chat statistics, message statistics in channels, see channel members, see anonymous administrators in supergroups and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege

      • setCanManageChat

        public void setCanManageChat​(@NonNull
                             java.lang.Boolean canManageChat)
        Parameters:
        canManageChat - True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, chat statistics, message statistics in channels, see channel members, see anonymous administrators in supergroups and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege

      • getCanDeleteMessages

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanDeleteMessages()
        Returns:
        True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users

      • setCanDeleteMessages

        public void setCanDeleteMessages​(@NonNull
                                 java.lang.Boolean canDeleteMessages)
        Parameters:
        canDeleteMessages - True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users

      • getCanManageVideoChats

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanManageVideoChats()
        Returns:
        True, if the administrator can manage video chats

      • getCanRestrictMembers

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanRestrictMembers()
        Returns:
        True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members

      • setCanRestrictMembers

        public void setCanRestrictMembers​(@NonNull
                                  java.lang.Boolean canRestrictMembers)
        Parameters:
        canRestrictMembers - True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members

      • getCanPromoteMembers

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanPromoteMembers()
        Returns:
        True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that he has promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)

      • setCanPromoteMembers

        public void setCanPromoteMembers​(@NonNull
                                 java.lang.Boolean canPromoteMembers)
        Parameters:
        canPromoteMembers - True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that he has promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)

      • getCanChangeInfo

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanChangeInfo()
        Returns:
        True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings

      • setCanChangeInfo

                             java.lang.Boolean canChangeInfo)
        Parameters:
        canChangeInfo - True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings

      • getCanInviteUsers

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Boolean getCanInviteUsers()
        Returns:

      • getCanPostMessages

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Boolean getCanPostMessages()
        Returns:
        Optional. True, if the administrator can post in the channel; channels only

                               java.lang.Boolean canPostMessages)

      • getCanEditMessages

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Boolean getCanEditMessages()
        Returns:
        Optional. True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; channels only

                               java.lang.Boolean canEditMessages)
